description: A case result is a single test case result.

^(expectedFailure)$.description: Denotes if the test is expected to fail. True, if the test case was expected to fail.

expected_failure.description: Denotes if the test is expected to fail. True, if the test case was expected to fail.

input.description: The input used to invoke the test case.

success.description: Success state of the test case. True if the test case succeeded.

title: Case Result
